input: The experience was heavenly as I was served a meal fit for God himself. After my meal, I was knocked into a food coma.
I'd give more than 5 stars if I could!
Was pleasantly surprised. The entrees are simply to die for.
The food was flavorful, savory, and succulent. I found the ambiance to be very charming.
Everything was simply decadent. The decor was unique and incredible.
Everything was just so yummy.
I felt the prices were too high given the quality of the food.
I had a less than satisfactory experience and will probably not be here again.
Dreadful place. I found an eyelash that definitely wasn't mine in my food.
I wish I could put a sign out front that said DON'T EAT HERE!
Eating here is like playing Russian Roulette, only you have a 5 out of 6 chance of getting food poisoning.
The photos of the food were appetizing.
I was not very pleased to find out that the coffee wasn't organic.
The service was good for the most part.
I had a satisfactory experience and will have to try it again.
I found the entrees to be very agreeable to my personal flavor-profile.
Make sure to save room for dessert, because that was the best part of the meal!
The food was flavorful, savory, and succulent.
I felt the prices were too high given the quality of the food.
The chicken was a little dry. The whole place was just dirty.
